name: Orb: The Creator
description:
Orb: The Creator is a fixed-camera platformer featuring an orb and a box.

In this game, you must move the box to accomodate for platforming puzzles in 8 different levels and get your orb to the portal.

This game was originally made during the Newgrounds August Game Jam.

P.S. look at the backgrounds when you play! the backgrounds increase, for up to 4 different parallaxing layers!!
